creditline:
The Minnich Collection
The Ethel Morrison Van Derlip Fund, 1966
description: Album with color lithography illustrations, titled "Le Vrai & le Faux Chic" (The True and False Chic), written and illustrated by SEM [Georges Goursat], and published in Paris in 1914. Illustrations in color & in black & white including mounted photos, pictures of cars, interior design & fashion along with several advertising pages of french luxury, restaurants, champagne, perfume etc. 28 leaves are unpaginated + 2 additional loose pages.
title: Le Vrai & Le Faux Chic
